sub_title: Creative director setting up playgrounds for radical imagination.
summary:
I'm a creative director crafting meaningful, story-driven human interactions in creative industries ranging from advertising, tech, education, and film. Committed to multiplayer collaboration.

I am also shaped by the careers I aspired to pursue but ultimately did not follow. I'm a frustrated dancer, a choreographer of experiences and rituals, and a hype man for poetic moments. I trust in play, I see friction as potential, and I'm a supporter of collective ways of developing change.
   
I hold a Masters in Interactive Communications (ITP) from New York University.
I am based in Amsterdam heading Imagination of Things, a play studio blending narrative, game design, and creative technology to spark cultural impact. 

https://imagination.ooo

Specialties: Play thinking, Experiential Design, Branded Content, Transmedia Storytelling, Creative Direction, Copywriting, Content Strategy, Video Direction, Creative Technology.

treasury_media.title: Ten seconds
treasury_media.description: A poetic AR Lens inspired by Fred Roger's prompt. Take ten seconds and think about the people that helped you become who you are.

treasury_media.title: Hey Honey on how it helped Crocs Europe ensure its first collaboration was a smash hit
treasury_media.description: Our collaboration with Hey Honey won the ‘Best Integrated Marketing Campaign’ category at The Drum Awards for the Digital Industries 2021. We designed and produced a playful activation and turned the incredible energy of the artist (Cauchemar) into interactions on their e-commerce website.

treasury_media.title: Crocs x Little Big Collab Case Video
treasury_media.description: Crocs x Little Big Collab - created by the Hey Honey agency, where Imagination of Things collaborated to design the activation, e-commerce art direction, and Instagram AR filter development.

treasury_media.title: Wordplay in between reality
treasury_media.description: An article documenting our process of setting up a collaborative workshop about poetic uses of AR.

projects.title: Party Starters
projects.description: “Party Starter” is a concept developed to highlight the people that move the scene. The dancer, the DJ, the promoter. The party starters are the ones making sure a party finds its peak. PARTY STARTERS is a video series to tell the stories of these wonderful party animals moving the Brazilian scene forward.

contributors.headline: Creative director setting up playgrounds for radical imagination.

projects.title: WVEF Tech Challenge
projects.description:
The International Trade Centre (ITC), Google, and CI&T launched the WVEF Tech Challenge 2015, calling on software developers and other tech specialists to help create a digital platform for women-owned businesses (WOBs) across the world. 

We engaged the tech community to propose new tools to women’s business enterprises to better access the global market. Key activities: Designing guidelines, mentoring participants, coaching finalists, promoting the initiative.

projects.title: IJO
projects.description:
IJO means dance in Yoruba. The project was born inside a series of actions with the objective of reframing the place of dance and a re-appropriation of the public spaces. By positioning themselves in front of “IJO”, the participants will have a visual representation of their bodies exhibited in large projection. Dance to tell who you are.
The project was part of the Circuito SESC de Artes - art and culture roadtrip exhibition in the state of Sao Paulo, and part of FILE 2015 - International Festival of Electronic Language.

projects.title: Het ware noorden (The true north )
projects.description:
How to engage a sustainability playground with its local community?
We created Het Ware Noorden, a label that promotes creative re-use sessions and its resulting products. Rough. Truthful. Raw. Resourceful. By Doers and Makers. A platform to connect De Ceuvel with the craftsmen and artists from Amsterdam North. Het Ware Noorden celebrates the common ground between De Ceuvel and the people of Amsterdam Noord, tapping into existing behavior and enhancing its possibilities.

projects.title: #MESACYBORG
projects.description: At Mesa&Cadeira, a group of extremely talented people (among them a dental surgeon, a dancer, an engineer, a psychologist, and an architect) worked together for 6 days led by Neil Harbisson and Moon Ribas, the world's first recognized cyborgs. Their mission was to create a way to communicate to the world the concept and mission of cyborgism. During this time they developed the "Design Yourself" concept, including a platform, a visual identity, and the prototype of "WeTooth" a trans-dental communication system.

projects.title: Caçadores de Energia for Guaraná Antarctica
projects.description:
Transmedia storytelling project

The story begins when a young actor and videomaker decides to create a stir on the internet to convince his best friend not to move away and leave Brazil. Guarana Antarctica, an iconic brazilian soda brand, notices the buzz and presents João with a challenge: to find ten people with “Contagious Energy” (Guarana Antarctica’s theme) throughout Brazil.

courses.name: Xth Sense - Sounds of your muscles

profile_positions.description:
A creative studio blending design and technology to craft meaningful stories and spark cultural impact. Based in Amsterdam, with a network of collaborators in New York and Sao Paulo. 

Highlights:

Buro OS spaces of life - Series of AR experiences in the architecture exhibition celebrating the work of Ole Schereen at the ZKM museum.
His Name is My Name - Instagram documentary concept, design, and AR development, winner of the Creative Tech Award IDFA 2022.
Crocs collabs (Cauchemar and Little Big) - Playful activation including e-commerce takeovers, social AR, and game contests to launch limited editions (collabs) for Crocs EU.
Henkel - Experience Design for their investigation of new product imagination.
EU Commission / The Disjointed Research Machine - AI-infused word game using the EU database of scientific reports. Presented at Bozar Museum, Brussels.

profile_positions.description:
Hyperfaces: interfaces versus ruptures program explores the question of the evolution of interfaces and their impact on individuals, their behavior, and our societies. 

As part of the residency, Imagination of Things created the "Lab for European Contradictions" and a prototype to subvert the official tour of the European Parliament in Strasbourg, using augmented reality and immersive sound.

profile_positions.description: 72U is a creative residency that lives within 72andSunny and is designed for makers and creative hybrids who want to make a positive impact in Amsterdam and beyond.

profile_positions.title: Poetic Technologist Resident

profile_positions.description:
In 2010 I founded a creative studio in Sao Paulo focused on branded content and social strategy, working for clients like Guaraná Antarctica, Fusion Energy Drink, ESPM, Cyrela and DM9DDB. 
I was leading a talented team of screenwriters, designers, and producers. 

After 2013, the company became the platform for my work as a creative consultant for clients like Ambev and SapientNitro Brasil.
profile_positions.title: Founder / Creative director
